website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest speed chutes available for the lowest price. Durable and easy to use.
pros: At a great price, this 56" speed chute offers a high level of resistance
Free-motion ring attaches anywhere on the belt, allowing for diverse training exercises
Velcro belt fits up to a 42" waist
cons: Not ideal for beginners because large chute speed provides lots of resistance

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nice experience with seller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it for exercising. Very easy to use and work as expected. However, the hook was broken after couple of times using. Had sent a message to seller. They are very nice and sent me another one even past returned date.
customer_reviews.author: net

customer_reviews.title: Get definition and endurance
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 y/o grandson is a runner, and bought this to provide a better training tool. He runs with it in the park, and gets compliments and people asking him about it all the time. In the six months since he's had it, I can say he looks more defined, and certainly it has helped with his running routine/endurance. Came in a nice carry pouch that fits into the front pocket of his backpack very easily. Lightweight, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: 45Vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Training Umbrella for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This training umbrella is fantastic for the price. It is constructed very well and very lightweight. I like the fact that it does come with a carrying case which makes it super easy to store when not in use. The fabric is sturdy and easy to clean. This will be a staple in my client training routine in the Spring & Summer.
customer_reviews.author: K Paige Engle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but works AMAZINGLY!
customer_reviews.text: I used this instead of the XDOG vest parachute for my dog. Works amazingly. Super cheap, but actually well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morales

customer_reviews.title: Resistance Parachute
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what the manufacturer claims. It is an important addition to our equipment.
customer_reviews.author: wgnmgm1a1

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to train for track. Can't beat the price and quality. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Want to get faster?  Try these!
customer_reviews.text: My boys wanted to work on speed training for soccer, and we saw these parachutes! They are so fun, and the perfect amount of resistance! The whole family has had fun with these parachutes, and they have held up quite well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Quitno

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my high intensity workouts
customer_reviews.text: Definitely got some stares at the park today, but I'm all about working out for as little time as possible while getting maximum benefit. This chute helps with my high intensity workouts and got me huffing and puffing faster than regular sprints would. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better practice, its hard. but after a few tries you will get the hang
customer_reviews.author: Honest Aaron USA

customer_reviews.title: Training the dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help exercise my dog. I absolutely love it! He builds strength and speed all while just playing frisbee! Good quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Abrezina

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance
customer_reviews.text: Great resistance and it has held up to a lot of use from different athletes
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Increased my speed to a whole new level!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great tool for speed training or just a more intense running session! The cord that holds the parachute is about 4 feet so it’s the perfect length that your feet don’t get caught in it but it’s also not trailing too far behind. The belt is adjustable to about a 60” waist and fits very nicely. The only reason I give this 4 stars is that the belt tightener loose and hard to figure out, I haven’t looked too closely at it and I’m sure if I did I could figure it out but other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my son wanted and has been pleased with it. I am the one who set it up, so I will add that the instructions could have been a little clearer! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great for speed training
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter has been training for track and basketball for the last 4-5 years or so and she was recommended this by her track coach. She has increased her speed in just a few short weeks and I can't wait to see what she can do after a few months of use. This is easy to use and does exactly what it's intended to do. It did take a few tries the first few times she tried using it but once she figured it out it was game on from there. Very inexpensive way to add some speed.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Too small,  cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Adds little to no resistance. Much smaller than the picture suggests. The material doesn't feel high quality
customer_reviews.author: Rahsaan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have high school football players using them weekly and they have held up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my workout
customer_reviews.text: Great resistance while running even with a little wind. Good material as well I have had some in the past that do not feel as good quality as this one. I would highly recommend this item for beginners and intermediate athletes.
customer_reviews.author: Cassaundra Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother so he could do speed training for basketball. The cord is a good length and it doesn’t get all wrapped up around his feet. The parachute is a good size and doesn’t take too much to get it to catch some wind.
customer_reviews.author: April Frizalone

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at the beginning because I wanted to use it with the dogs in combination with sled harness it worked from the first second I am very satisfied with the product and can recommend it also to people who like to be active with the dogs. Very uncomplicated and easy to buckle up and off you go. I am very satisfied with the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Truda

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the belt came apart the second time I used this product. I’m not sure if I got a defective belt or if it’s just bad quality. I followed instruction on how to loop the belt through the clip to secure it back in place but it will not stay tightened. Besides that, this seems to be a good training product for sprinters
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ruvalcaba

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Eh it is alright, no one here was impressed with the quality. It worked when my son ran at certain speeds, to slow or to fast it is useless. Did not come with instructions
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: save time♾
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about working out for as little time as possible while getting maximum benefit. This is easy to use and does exactly what it's intended to do. I did take a few tries the first few times I tried using . Very inexpensive way to add some speed.
customer_reviews.author: abrar azam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up much space!
customer_reviews.text: I am assuming it is a great product because it is an awesome garage ornament! My husband "had" to have it knowing he was never going to run!
customer_reviews.author: Amrios4

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great challenge for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great challenge for my 9 year old. It’s actually making him run faster and I’m sure the more he uses it the better his athleticism will be
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge weight trainer or anything but I was just looking for something to vary my cardio workouts; I have to say this does the trick! It's cheap and easy to use and setup, adds another layer of fun to working out and increases the calories burned per workout!
customer_reviews.author: MDetty

customer_reviews.title: good for young athletes
customer_reviews.text: One of my grand kids asked for help with his speed. I seen the product and he loves it. The price was ok, but it was a good fit for him.
customer_reviews.author: Educator

customer_reviews.title: Great speed or resistance training for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Provides good resistance, even at lower speeds, like myself.
customer_reviews.author: khordkutta

customer_reviews.title: Modify it and works great.
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use but it does no create enough resistance even for my 12 and 9 year old kids so what I did is cut the small center strap so it will look like a real parachute and oh boy what a difference that made. Now it generates more resistance and my kids really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for son in college
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son in college. He uses it. Not sure about thickness or easy to put on. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I tried this at the beach and caught everyone’s attention. On top of the sand adding weight, this is definitely great for a workout. Doubles the progress.
customer_reviews.author: David Miami

customer_reviews.title: Shute is too small
customer_reviews.text: I use this on teens and it is still too small, not much resistance
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected to receive. I am a larger runner, so I have the belt maxed out. My only negative critic is that it is impossible to get it back into its bag
customer_reviews.author: M.Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: it's great.
customer_reviews.text: it's great. With a little resistance, it does make a difference. I tend to start with a descent and just put the glideslope from the taxiway-after a few steps, the resistance starts. Then do some track and field training-it will make a big difference... it is very effective for my hungry speed training
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine its really easy to use or understand it does the job and great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ty C

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The waist belt could be better. Continuous have to tighten as it goes loose after each run.Quality looks fine, but will wait and see!
customer_reviews.author: Yedda

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome, excellent for adding that extra difficulty during sprint starts. How the buckles fit onto the waist strap is slightly poorly done but overall I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: No thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and difficult to use with o oh one person.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help my son with speed work for soccer. He liked the easy setup and the ease of use. For the price it has been a good method to help him work on sprinting. Using the chute is seen as fun and cool, so he enjoys using it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Deck

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice parachute but I wish the strap was adjustable and I found it did not hold a lot of air when I spinted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible belt design
customer_reviews.text: The parachute works just fine...if you can get the belt to stay on. The belt is a terrible design, the belt slides through the clip extremely easy. It makes it extremely hard to use it in drills changing direction.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hawthrone

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to parachute for Christmas! I realized that he would not exercise on this, but he was very happy when he saw it! So perfect for him! Can't wait to see him use his imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Virna J Diaz

customer_reviews.title: High resistance
customer_reviews.text: I tried it in the training ground, the exercise strength is very good, there is a certain resistance, the quality is not bad, it completely exceeds the expected value, and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gerding

customer_reviews.title: Resistance training at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Love this! On windy days I get lifted by the parachute! Great workout trainer
customer_reviews.author: Mone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great as a gift for my nephew and good quality
customer_reviews.author: rebecca hampton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not as much resistance as you would think. Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Exected
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Bought it for my son for Christmas and he thought it was great. The storage bag that comes with it is great to be able to stuff it in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good product,
customer_reviews.text: Good product, the best part is that the faster you run, the more you can get back! ! ! Recommend everyone to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rider

customer_reviews.title: Needs English Directions!
customer_reviews.text: Well, the directions aren't in English soo not sure if we have assembled correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, he likes it! Quality goods and excellent prices. I will recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Moton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Getting faster every time I use the product. Sprints are feeling easier and smoother
customer_reviews.author: Chace Andrew D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Retraining sucks
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to put on. But as far as adjustments and restraining is very poor
customer_reviews.author: Travon t.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to but I does help
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Waters

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for a better quality
customer_reviews.text: My Elementary School Track team has used it and it has been breaking down and ripping. It hasn't lasted 1 month yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: You’ll drag it more than anything.. not really ...
customer_reviews.text: You’ll drag it more than anything.. not really meant for casual runs, seems to only take use when you’re full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cosenza

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, works well, it's a perfect product for it's cheap price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Resistance Parachute
customer_reviews.text: Works as it's described,really helped me a lot ,thanks,has good quality and worth the money i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: bit like trying to keep a kite flying
customer_reviews.text: not much resistance... bit like trying to keep a kite flying...
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: My son & his friends love using this to increase their running speed
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: No return and it’s defective
customer_reviews.text: The item is junk. It ripped with the first use. Do not purchase this product. There is a no return policy as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: It was terrible and did nothing even on a windy day
customer_reviews.author: grayson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t catch much wind it just stays on the ground behind while sprinting
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. Does not use it much ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Does not use it much now. But will probably get back on it during summer.
customer_reviews.author: Anil A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you get used to it and great for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Iliana Rivera Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped first time it was used. All he did was run.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for soccer training. Easy to use. I have used it a few times myself and it doesn't seem to add much resistance for a 200 lb male. Although it is extremely likely that I can't run fast enough to feel the resistance!
customer_reviews.author: crisinger

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Was here in less than 24 hours my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rural W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's worth it and really work... My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Adams Trucking

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: No resistance. I coach Semi Pro Football and bought for training. The waistband didnt fit around all the way and when i gave it a try there was like no resistance. Think this was made for children
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design is a bit unwieldy.  Have to work with it a bit.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit flimsy and unwieldy. My 9 yr old athletic daughter loves it. My 13 yr old daughter is not so enamored.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Epperson

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Not worth a star. The belt did not come hooked together so I had to manually put the belt through the loop clip and every time my kids run with it the belt slips right off because the belt has no teeth keeping it in place. Good thing this thing is $8. Picture attatched.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the packaging of this item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the packaging of this item! I would have loved for it to at least came in a box and not just a draw string bag! Otherwise nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Little

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its nice, but it can use a little book for drills
customer_reviews.author: jamal

customer_reviews.title: not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: it's okay but not very durable as my team was running with it on and it ripped. not the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: NikeMadMan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Parachute is kind of small, thought it would add more resistance
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stockings

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for resistance to much flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt pleased with product it takes a lot to get the parachute to stay up, hardly any resistance. Wouldn't recommend this to anyone very poorly designed. You spend more time trying to hold the chute up then actually getting resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I’m not extraordinary fast, but at my peak speed I could keep the chute aloft, but I never felt any associated resistance. Ineffective...
customer_reviews.author: F. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Look at these immediately upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: Returning this item. It was inoperable from the start. I ordered 4 and 2 are broken. The straps were never installed at the factory or where ever they were put together.
customer_reviews.author: Garland Cole

customer_reviews.title: This is a hazard to use
customer_reviews.text: The string is not long enough so your feet could be caught by the parachute and makes you fall down hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No resistance
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no resistance with this. My 9 year old (who I bought it for) could not feel it even directly into the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Really Easily
customer_reviews.text: On the first day, I received the speed parachute the ropes connecting the parachute all came off in that one day. I don't know if mine has defected but it is made out of poor and cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it for an adult or even a high school kid , maybe a toddler, offers almost no resistance
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect much from this
customer_reviews.text: Provided no real resistance I was very disappointed and threw it out
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective. The strap & buckle system is completely defective. Will not hold. Not usable. Will ask the amazon vendor for assistance or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product one time. In the first 5min One of the straps tore off.
customer_reviews.author: heidi a polacek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: 14 yr old uses it for training during summer break - good value
customer_reviews.author: J Lo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel much resistance, but the players certainly did. I'd also recommend running into the wind. They are very efficient in that direction. Less efficient with the wind at your back. Once you've used it a few times and figure it out a little bit, it is quite useful. The quality seems good and the whole team has used them at multiple practices now without issue. Seems like a great training aid so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dunn

customer_reviews.title: This training umbrella is good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This training umbrella is good and cheap. It is very well constructed and very lightweight. I like the fact that it does come with a carrying case, which can be stored very easily when not in use. The fabric is strong and easy to clean. In spring and summer, this will be the main content of my trainees' training program.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Menegol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of things is good, you must run quickly when you use it, otherwise the umbrella will drag the ground. My son's playground can't run after a lap, and he drags the ground as soon as he slows down. The material is good but the taste is a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The chute is actually durable which I found out when my puppy randomly jumped on it out of no where with his nails more on the sharp side at the time. There wasn't a mark on it after the surprise attack which made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Tyler

customer_reviews.title: feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The black one is cool, it feels good when running, and the quality is good. It is very suitable for track and field training. I will introduce a friend to buy it next time
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: The belt for children is a bit bigger and needs to be changed manually. It is still effective to see my son running.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Klatt

customer_reviews.title: it is a super simple training umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s not that I really like it, but that 15-year-old son. Either way, it is a super simple training umbrella, easy to pack, easy to understand how to use, easy to adjust to fit your own parts Wait.I am looking to buy some gifts and have recommended them to my own friends for resistance training.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla R.

product_meta.title: KUYOU Running Speed Training 56 inch Speed Training Resistance Parachute Umbrella Running Chute & Fitness Explosive Power Training (Black)
feature_bullets: PERFECT SIZE - 56" diameter, 25-35 lbs of resistance .
ADJUSTABLE BELT - Velcro closures waist belt for all body types of users, (up to a 42" waist) ,The belt rotates 360 degrees and has a free motion ring, meaning you can sprint in any direction.
GREAT HELPING FOR RUNNER -Provides excellent resistance training for improved speed, stamina, strength, and acceleration Chute releases while running for overspeed training.
DURABLE -Made of high quality parachute cloth,Built-in mesh panels keep strings from tangling and helps stabilize the chute during training .

MULIT USED -Whether you’re in track and field, football, soccer, basketball, or any other sport, your speed will improve with the use of this resistance training chute, Best for long-distance running .
